entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
